Name: Gallant “Nightstalker” Rifle
Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Assault Rifle
Class: Energy (Laser)

Magazine Size: 120
Rate Of Fire: 450 rpm
Effective Range: 50 m

Attachments: Optics (S2), Barrel (S2), Underbarrel (S2)

Dependable assault weapons never go out of style. Klaus & Werner maintains that tradition by unveiling the Gallant. This energy-based assault rifle is capable of providing accurate and sustained fire at targets up to medium range, while its high-capacity power system allows operators to fire considerably more shots per battery.
